title: Staff of Spell Power
content: Staff of Spell Power Very Rare 3~10 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6)+2 Bludgeoning Arcane Enchantment: You gain a +1 bonus to Spell Save DC and spell attack rolls. Arcane Battery: Alleviate the arcane burden of spellcasting with the power of this staff. The next spell you cast doesn't cost a spell slot. Weapon Enchantment +2 Main Hand OnlyTopple Bound Weapon A near-perfect relic that is only blemished by the collected palm- sweat of various archrnagifrom across the Realms. Q
